content: The Wolf Assassin isn't a boss by any means, so the fight won't give you as much trouble as Wandering Wight or some other big Spirit battles. The Wolf Assassin fights like many of the other wolves you will face on Black Wind Mountain - with knives. The Wolf Assassin can throw them, so make sure you keep your eyes peeled for any long-range attacks.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Wolf_Assassin_Spirit.md", within the section "Wolf Assassin Spirit" and the sub-section "Wolf Assassin Fight". The content is presented below:

The Wolf Assassin isn't a boss by any means, so the fight won't give you as much trouble as Wandering Wight or some other big Spirit battles. The Wolf Assassin fights like many of the other wolves you will face on Black Wind Mountain - with knives. The Wolf Assassin can throw them, so make sure you keep your eyes peeled for any long-range attacks.
